name: Medusa's Labyrinth
description: Medusa’s Labyrinth is a very short mythological first-person horror game set in ancient Greece. It takes myths and legends that have stayed with us for over 2000 years and mix them together with modern gameplay. The game let's you explore murky catacombs and follow along a classic, tragic story.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bi Processor: AMD® A10 5750M 2,5 Ghz or Intel® Core ™ i5-4210H 2.90GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 860M / ATI Radeon ™ HD 7970M DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bi Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-2700K 3.50GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Ti/ ATI Radeon ™ HD7870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device

reviews.review_text: A very good picture and caricature of Greek mythology mixed with excellent horror in a labyrinth. Excellent sound design , concept and execution. Best of all, it is a free horror game. Awesome little horror title

I would reccomend this game, it didnt scare me big time or anything, a few jumpscares and a decent monster. The graphics are top notch though and the inventory system was very unique and realistic. The story to this was mediocre at best, somewhat of a cliffhanger, you can envision your own ending. Its only about an hour long sadly, I even enjoyed the scenery and messed around a little but still came out to an hour. Is it great? Naw, is it good? yeah. Its free so try it out, i'm sure if the develepors made a new game that had more to it I would pay for it.

It's quite short,around 30-40 minutes but it's a quite entertaining experience. Graphics and audio are great and the atmoshere was terrifying.  Unfortunately there isn't an actual ending in the game. A bigger game with the same setting would be quite interesting. Greek mythology has many cool monsters:).

This game is not bad at all. It is very short but it shows a lot of potential. Tried it out and made it through on my first try. I love the inventory system and wish there would be more games like this which make it feels very realistic.

Short game, It was fun for a few minutes. Gives a small fear factor for the little amount of time I played it, however, I still like how it did everything in an Amnesia style. No jump scares, just being genuinely scared of monsters roaming around.

this game is supossed to be free,but I had to buy 4 pairs of pants through the first 115 minutes,and I do very well with creepy games and stuff,other than that it's a very good game and is well made,I never got al the way through it,but what I saw was very good,the statue at the very beginning is veeeeeeeery creepy

It is a very good game for its price. I loved the puzzles and the trial and error technique you could use to clear the game. Only thing I did not like was that you could add some speed to the game. If the game was a little bit longer I would pay for it, I hope that the developers make a new and longer game for us to consume. But dont expect so much from the game because its free. It would be a different world if it costed something.
Good game for a free game Stupid A.I and even stupidier ending 10/10 the statues were more scary than the monster itself
Downloaded the game, got my torch. Pause the game... Hear heart pounding, with what sounded like a minotour running and yelling. Too scared to play the game now (Q-Q)
HAHA greatest FTP game I have ever played

Great shorty If I must say. It was quite a good humanitarian adventure with a moral behind it. Aside the fact that the hostile being roaming the maze was as blind as a bat or rather an old granny trying to knit a pair of socks, the game was good. I tried offering some light to the monster, with the torch in hand, so that it could see well, but I don't know why it always slapped me so aggresively and break my skull everytime... I tried making friends with that skinny minotaur, but he rejected me as if he almost yelled : 'I have a boyfriend, beat it' then proceeded to biaatch slap me so ferociously. You're taken, geez, no need to murder me. The violins orchestra behind my back during my adventure amongst the creeping hallways, which were apparently in Medusa's bedroom was quite immersive, although I never managed to give my regards to the musicians. But darn they really like creepy music... Play some Beethoven, Tchaikovsky, Mozart .. or do a classical-dubstep hybrid to set the mood and kick it up a notch. Good luck with the dubstep part. Throw stones at the monster, it'd be the same thing.  Now jokes aside.. This game was worth the 30 minutes of my life. It was also good for a free-to-play experience. I use the word experience, because that's what it is in my eyes. A short little adventure with a pinch of psychological horror to bug your mind a bit. The reviews speak for themselves. Guru Games did a good job. It had its gaps, I must admit that, but nothing's perfect in this world plus the gaps are so tiny, they're hardly visible unless you're one of those people who try to break the game first and then play it (like me) I enjoyed it, though. Grab it, it's free. Roam a bit in Medusa's secret sex dungeon. You won't regret it
Not bad for a short 40minute game

If you want a free and short scare, this game is worth your time.  However, I don't know if you were supposed to kill the creatures with your bow at all, since I were able to sneak and run through the labyrinth on my first try.
Too buggy to play.
it good but i would have seen an better ending but if you looking for a time killer or just bored it is good and here is a game for you

A short free-to-play horror/suspense/stealth title, or more like a demo, with bare minimum gameplay mechanics. Very similar to Amnesia: The Dark Descent, but nowhere close to a good execution. The sound and atmosphere is pretty good, but falls short with a teleporting monster that one-hit-kill's you (there are automatic checkpoint saves so don't worry about dying), bow and arrow that doesn't do ♥♥♥♥, automatically dropping a torch when you equip a bow and arrow, poorly optimized with framerate drops, and the trial and error nature until you finish the game.  Medusa's Labyrinth is a hit or miss
scary peice of game

I played through this game and took my time to check out everything as I tend to do in games. Graphically the game looks ok. I am one of those that dislikes invisible walls. If you do not want somebody to be able to walk somewhere make it also look like you can't walk there. To me the game wasn't scary at all. Even thou the sound effects and the monster you meet are trying to create scary moments.  It wasn't a horrible experience just nothing that got me into being able to recommend it for how it played out for me.  Yes, it is a free game but for me it wasn't something I would recommend just because it is free. It didn't do it for me.

oh god thank god i did not pay for this game D: soo bleugh , so bland no content , omg wanted to hang my self after half an hour , just couldnt get into it ,   be a good game for those kind of people who .... have never ever played a game before... ;)
♥♥♥♥ THIS ♥♥♥♥ IM OUT

hmmm not bad. my first horror indie game. i have a suggestion though. in the begining i saw flames on top of water. i thought maybe those flames could be perhapps a bon fire made of wood or something, or perhapps maybe the wooden parts left behind by a seige? i didnt get the fire on water though. going up the stairs and seeing actual candles burning made more sense, this is still in the begining of the game.  also i really like the small detail you left behind when i saw a trentch line in the middle of my path in the catacomb area. the trentch line was to collect body fluids that seep from decomposing corpses. i bet it smelt pretty bad back in those older days down there. i couldnt kill the guy at the end. i tried many time. i ran out of arrows and couldnt find a sword or anything. so i gave up.   to the other adventurers who are downloading this game. when you find the 5th and final note. get ready for the action. getting the bow and arrow doesnt mean your going to see action right away. i just noticed after you read the 5th note your going to see something horrifying deep into that cave your walking threw.   over all, i loved the suspense music, the heart beat sound effect was a little over powering and sort of ruined it but the snarling and walking foot steps and music sound effects was excelent. i wore a headset for the best effects. would i recommend this game? YES I WOULD i rate it a (8 out of 10 stars) good job :)
Very short game, not scary at all. They should make it longer and way more scary, if you want to call this game a horror.

Not a game as much as a demo. This looks like a school project based on the UT4 engine.  Pros: * Graphics are decent * Sound/Music is excellent  Cons: * No actual game play * Physics suck (eg. you can jump/walk into fire or fire pits and you don't burn - nothing happens * Items are limited * No story other than the pieces of paper that you find lying around * Too short * If you miss with the bow whilst a monster is charging at you you are dead, no second chances * Resolution limited to Windowed 1920x1080... really!? No full screen or higher resolution! * Can't jump higher than 10cm and can't climb at all!  Bottom line: If you want to play a demo go ahead and enjoy this - if you are looking for a game, you are at the wrong place! Even for a demo, recommended ONLY if it is free!
A fun demo, did a good job of creating a tense atmosphere by using the heartbeats to show how close you were to danger and the music was great (particularly the harp track).

A short thriller free to play. There is no way I'm giving this a negative review. Yes it was short, and one monster encounter was a little irritating than hard, but all in all, I creeped out and got scared a few times. But then again I'm softball when it comes to horror games.  There is a small lore/story in the game and minimal shooting. But mostly you are walking around a creepy environment with great graphics. Takes an hour at most. Turned up volume with quality headphones recommended.  For a summer project made by students, it's awesome.
Medusa's Labyrinth
Scary but short :(
Recommended.
I played it, and it dont make sinn.
Great graphics m8  IGN would rate this 11/10 , but since it's me I'ma say 0/10. Would not walking simulate again. Would not letter reading simulate again.
Fantastic atmosphere. Haven't been this scared since Amnesia.

This game is terrifying! I was scared from the get go and for good reason. The music is perfect and destroys your confidnce and the ambence is on point. the enviorment shifts and is erri as hell. Every thing went together perfectly, from the loud crashes and long held notes to the slow ♥♥♥ walking to the no damage bow. Had to stop playing several times.

I had an hour of enjoyment in this game, its small but fun and scary. I got quite terrified from noises alone but the minotaurs were pretty easy because i just arrow'd them in head and kept walking.  8//10 would reccomend
OMG 10 outa 10 ofr this game kinda scary but this game should be very popular by now
♥♥♥♥ myself, left it foir a week, came back, ♥♥♥♥ my self, left, came back meade a video good story great graphics
never seen a horror game like this i enjoyed it the monsters could use a little work but it was so cool atmosphere sound setting was so cool
Less than an hour long game, its free and gives a good amount of horror.

I really wanted to like this game, but I just can't. The beginning feels like a walking simulator and the story is told with the help of some letters you can find. For some reason I only found the 2nd one of the father's letters, but not the first. I gave up looking for it pretty soon after walking into some invisible wall. As I continued to explore the temple, sometimes there was creepy music and some visual effects (which were supposed to be creepy too?) but it didn't fit into the atmosphere. To me both was rather annyoing and breaking the immersion. Also I felt like the sound effects were messed up - when I encountered a creature that approached me from the right, I heard it from the left. When I pressed Esc to get to the menu, the window suddenly got bigger and moved to the right. That's the moment I called it quits, as it didn't feel like it was worth to restart the game and finish it.  Tl;dr This game has so much potential, but maybe not as a horror game. The way it is now it's too repetitive. Also the story could be a bit more immersive. At least the graphics are good and the mechancis have potential too - but they're not really used.
Its like a low quality Talos Principle. %200 worth the money.  Thanks devs for a visually appeling and inticing game.
very interesting game with alot of potential i think, only issue i ran into is it not being scary enough. im curious to see how this game ends up turning out
Great little game, the atmosphere the devs built is quite amazing and looking forward to seeing more from them.

Fantastic game so far! I hope that there is more to the game because it was great fun but ended to quickely. The only suggestion i can think of is a way for players to customize controls to the keys and buttons that they wish instead of only the default controls. Overall 10 out of 10 game had me on the edge of my seat the entire time !

this is brilliantly atmospheric! Eerie and peaceful at first, but suprisginly edgy when you move onwards, especially once you walk through the passageway and into... Medusa's Labyrinth! It's awesome, i've only played for 1.4 hours and already i want to start again just so i can experience the awesomely atmospheric beginning once more! I normally at least want to finish a game before i experience the start again, give myself a chance to forget it a bit first, you know... But not with this, this makes me want to experience what i already know happens, based purely on it having exactly the right feeling while you are moving carefully through the areas... the way your footsteps faintly echo, the way that you feel the need to spin around quickly because of a slight change in the lighting behind you or a scratching sound like something just ran past you in the shadows!  It is a game which does not want you to, nor does it allow for you to, remain calm or collected... in fact, if you have a pacemaker, you may want to set it to extra slow!
Love this game but that's not Medusa that's a minotaur. Medusa is a gorgon that has snakes for hair but otherwise really good cinematics for this game, really love it.
Even though i didn't play much yet I love the overall atmosphere of the game!!!
that was scary

After beating the game for the first time i have to say that i loved it overall, but as i played through i found alot of bugs in just the one playthrough. the game has alot going for it. definitely worth a try.

Very inmersive, an awesome music and very well done creepy sounds... The game puts yourself in a very well treated scenarios, with an amazing atmosphere that really drives us into the old greek times.. I enjoyed this game a lot due to that things... The dark atmosphere, the need of torches, the sounds of the monster..i fall in love with this game... The only bad thing is that is very short! (and the monster could be better... the moves, the repetitive hoff sounds... anyway i enjoyed it! This game could be great if they create a larguer version! If they develope that...i will surely pay for it! Pretty recommended for people who desires to feel the sensation of being trapped in a dungeon with a monster chasing us... Loved this game!!^^
Beautifully atmospheric short game relying mostly on suspense. For lovely artwork and a constant chilll up the spine, definitely give this game a shot.
It's short, but a fun little game to play... alone... in the dark >:)

Starting the game it already feels extremely weird in the main menu, seeing the counter drop to about 30 fps as I play on high, not even ultra, as the lighting effects draw all the frames.  Theres no advanced graphics options. Theres no way to go fullscreen. Windowed mode does what it wants.  But I decided to give it a try anyways and start.. Well, getting sick of the low visuals which I still prefer over a slideshow, I give it a try as the windowed mode decides to go weirdly all over my screen.  Welp, gameplay was a bit weird and didnt feel good either and the options and optimisation were horrendeous.

Awesome game, made me jump a few times and that's hard to do. Wish it were longer but as is and for it to be free to play I'd give it a 4 out of 5. Would give it a 5 out of 5 if it were longer. Give it a download nothing to lose, well maybe some boxer briefs.
Almost ♥♥♥♥ my ♥♥♥♥ing pants!  I dont usually play horror games... 10/10 would ♥♥♥♥ pants again
Neat little adventure

The game is very short, less than half an hour, but the atmosphere is so good it pull you into the game and it's enjoyable, the sound effect is great it make you tense but not too scary. the monsters are threatening but not too difficult which is good. Very good free short game!
Really short but got me a few goosebumps haha
